name: Wojak Rush
description:
Wojak Rush is a cartoon themed adventure game that containing many levels, platforms, parkour mechanics, ragdoll mechanics and enemies.

Wojak is bored with life again and wants some sleep to pass the time.

But this time his sleep will be much different than before.

Finding himself in a strange dream, Wojak finds himself in a relentless struggle to wake up from this dream.

No matter how much he wants to wake up, there are obstacles and enemies in his dream to not wake him up.

Although it is not easy at first to overcome these obstacles, you can get stronger and awaken yourself thanks to those who will help you.

Take your turret and dodge the obstacles and enemies that come your way!

Try to improve yourself with the gold from the enemies.

Will You Be Able to Wake the Sleeping Wojak?

Will you be able to pass the many enemies and obstacles in your dream?

Will you be able to save the Wojak from this relentless struggle?
